attributes.action: Stop Pendle Borough Council destroying Nelson Cemetery Allotments.
attributes.additional_details:
Nelson Cemetery Allotments are under threat by Pendle Borough Council. We don't want out beautiful environmentally friendly community hub transformed into a graveyard.
This is a place for the welfare of the living, a food source & a green community.
We wish to protest against the proposed eviction of the Nelson Cemetery Allotment Society in order to extend the area of the cemetery.
The society has been in existence for over 100 years and is a valuable community asset.
attributes.background: Our green Nelson Cemetery Allotment community request the government discourage Pendle Borough Council from destroying our community.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Pendle Borough Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
